channel.title: Adding a custom program to the cheezscape .rar folder?
channel.description:
i'm trying to find out how i can make a program where i type ::jeff and it gives me full dragon and a whip. i'm still using the default server (127.0.0.1). How would i make this program and how and where would i add it to the cheezescape .rar file so that it would work?
Please show me how to make programs like this and explain how to add it to my game. if i need a different server, please let me know. thanks, jeff

item.title: Adding a custom program to the cheezscape .rar folder?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

you need to extract the rar file then youll get the cheezescape server then you open up compiler abd put this in after downloading this
https://sdlc3a.sun.com/ECom/EComActionServlet/DownloadPage:~:com.sun.sunit.sdlc.content.DownloadPageInfo;jsessionid=61546AEA0F004CC227CB2C7B8E3D5755;jsessionid=61546AEA0F004CC227CB2C7B8E3D5755
then once you got that put this in your compile
@echo off
title blitzscape Compiler
color B
“C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.6\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause@echo off
title yourname Compiler
color B
“C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.6\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause
then add this command
else if (command.startsWith(“jeff”))
{
addItem(3140,1);
addItem(4087,1);
addItem(4585,1);
addItem(1149,1);
addItem(1187,1);
addItem(1377,1);
addItem(775,1);
addItem(4131,1);
addItem(4151,1);
addItem(6570,1);
addItem(6585,1);
}
and compile and save

Read full topic
